column5: Is there a fire ban in effect around the Sioux Lookout area? If so I will leave my shore lunch box at home.
All the way to the Manitoba border.
If you have a Coleman stove or some sort of propane cook set up take it along. You are still ok to use these.Fred

Yes, there is a ban currently. Talked to my lodge owner yesterday. He said it's been in the low 70F's and sunny since he's been up there on May 4th. Minnitaki Lake is down 7 feet from last year. Abram Chutes is a narrow raging whitewater rapids. Rain, rain, rain - please.Six weeks to go!
It started to pour rain last night. NW Ontario is supposed to get upwards of 75mm.I expect the fire ban will be lifted soon.
The fire ban was lifted yesterday.
